product_name: Mammut Light Protection Avalanche Airbag 30 Pack
long_description: The Light Protection Airbag 30 Pack uses the Protection Airbag System to help prevent burial and trauma in an avalanche, and it carries your shovel, probe and other gear for light backcountry days.
short_description: The Light Protection Airbag 30 Pack uses the Protection Airbag System to help prevent burial and trauma in an avalanche, and it carries your shovel, probe and other gear for light backcountry days.
